function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of historical data for new virus transmission, incubation period, and immunity duration.","Impact":"Difficulty in predicting COVID-19 incidence and outcomes.","Mitigation":"Research and data collection on virus transmission and immunity duration.","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, epidemiological studies, and data analytics.","People":"Public health researchers and epidemiologists.","Owner":"Public health organizations and research institutions."},{"Description":"Challenges in utilizing big data analytics for COVID-19 due to limited evidence and data.","Impact":"Possibility of inaccurate predictions and decision-making.","Mitigation":"Validation of analytics with available data, continuous data collection, and research collaboration.","Technologies":"Predictive analytics, data validation tools, and collaboration platforms.","People":"Data scientists, public health experts, and researchers.","Owner":"Government health agencies and research institutions."},{"Description":"Evolution of virus and development of mutant variants complicating prediction of COVID-19 incidence and outcomes.","Impact":"Increased uncertainty in managing the pandemic and developing effective strategies.","Mitigation":"Continuous genomic surveillance, international data sharing, and adaptive response strategies.","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, global data sharing platforms, and adaptive learning algorithms.","People":"Epidemiologists, virologists, and public health agencies.","Owner":"International health organizations and research institutions."}]}
